bib.title: Multilevel correction of OCR of medical texts
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: EN In the paper the idea of the multilevel correction of the results handwriting OCR of medical texts is investigated. The correction is performed according to different levels of linguistic knowledge. Three types of models, namely: the n-gram Language Models of word form and base form sequences, the morpho-syntactic model based on a tagger and the model of correction by parsing are presented and their results are compared. The parsing model is based on the combination of a deterministic Czech parser adapted for Polish and
